name: Workbook
description: Workbook is the top level object which contains related workbook objects such as worksheets, tables, ranges, etc.

properties.name: dataConnections
properties.description: Represents all data connections in the workbook.

properties.name: application
properties.description: Represents the Excel application instance that contains this workbook.

properties.name: customXmlParts
properties.description: Represents the collection of custom XML parts contained by this workbook.

properties.name: functions
properties.description: Represents a collection of worksheet functions that can be used for computation.

properties.name: names
properties.description: Represents a collection of workbook scoped named items (named ranges and constants).

properties.name: worksheets
properties.description: Represents a collection of worksheets associated with the workbook.

properties.name: tables
properties.description: Represents a collection of tables associated with the workbook.

properties.name: bindings
properties.description: Represents a collection of bindings that are part of the workbook.

properties.name: pivotTables
properties.description: Represents a collection of PivotTables associated with the workbook.

properties.name: settings
properties.description: Represents a collection of Settings associated with the workbook.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Gets the workbook name.

properties.name: properties
properties.description: Gets the workbook properties.

properties.name: protection
properties.description: Returns workbook protection object for a workbook.

properties.name: styles
properties.description: Represents a collection of styles associated with the workbook.

properties.name: readOnly
properties.description: True if the workbook is open in Read-only mode.

properties.name: isDirty
properties.description: True if no changes have been made to the specified workbook since it was last saved.

properties.name: use1904DateSystem
properties.description: True if the workbook uses the 1904 date system.

properties.name: chartDataPointTrack
properties.description: True if all charts in the workbook are tracking the actual data points to which they are attached.

properties.name: usePrecisionAsDisplayed
properties.description: True if calculations in this workbook will be done using only the precision of the numbers as they're displayed.

properties.name: calculationEngineVersion
properties.description: Returns a number about the version of Excel Calculation Engine. Read-Only.

properties.name: autoSave
properties.description: True if the workbook is in auto save mode.

properties.name: previouslySaved
properties.description: True if the workbook has ever been saved locally or online.

methods.name: getSelectedRange
methods.description: Gets the currently selected single range from the workbook. If there are multiple ranges selected, this method will throw an error.

methods.name: getSelectedRanges
methods.description: Gets the currently selected one or more ranges from the workbook. Unlike getSelectedRange(), this method returns a RangeAreas object that represents all the selected ranges.

methods.name: getActiveCell
methods.description: Gets the currently active cell from the workbook.

methods.name: getActiveChart
methods.description: Gets the currently active chart in the workbook. If there is no active chart, will throw exception when invoke this statement

methods.name: getActiveChartOrNullObject
methods.description: Gets the currently active chart in the workbook. If there is no active chart, will return null object

methods.name: getRange
methods.description: Gets the range object specified by the address or name.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address or the name of the range. If the sheet name is not specified, the currently-active worksheet is assumed.

methods.name: getIsActiveCollabSession
methods.description: True if the workbook is being edited by multiple users (co-authoring).
